abstract: Arthur C. Nielsen Jr. made his father’s company a global leader in market research whose name is synonymous with television ratings.
snippet: Arthur C. Nielsen Jr. made his father’s company a global leader in market research whose name is synonymous with television ratings.
lead_paragraph: Arthur C. Nielsen Jr., who transformed the company his father founded in 1923 into an international leader in market research, helping to make its name synonymous with television ratings, died on Monday in Winnetka, Ill., where he lived most of his life. He was 92.

headline.main: A.C. Nielsen Jr., Who Built Ratings Firm, Dies at 92
headline.print_headline: A.C. Nielsen Jr., Who Built Ratings Firm, Dies at 92
